page.title: 04CLUBS _ EVENTS
page.content: {Clubs_}Local activities often revolve around the various clubs and societies that are active in the area. In addition to the sports clubs already mentioned there is a thriving infra- structure of groups centred on the community centres and church halls. {The Methodist Church Hall}on the{Badminton Road in Downend,}the {community hall on Quaker's Road, {Downend, Frenchay Village Hall}and the {hall at Winterbourne Down}provide facilities for such groups as: {Cubs,Brownies,Scouts,Girl Guides, {Play Group,Mothers and Toddlers,youth {clubs,Young Wives, W.I.,Friendly {Circle,dance and aerobics,sports {clubs,O.A.P. groups etc. {Events_}Again local ventures are the norm with no major functions. Fetes and fairs organised by{school}or {church}support groups are frequent.
